divs: sighting detailsout on the balcony for a family river trip. i was first to notice slowly\moving small cluster of lights in distance atop low mountain range. about 10 family members came out & also witnessed the "floating" objects\lights. te lights seemed too far apart to be 1 object, they kept to a mostly straight formation path, some drifted. altitude seemed too high for helicopters (it was quiet, we heard no noise from them, but we were a fair distance away). also seemed to be moving too slow to be aircrafts. some others also had slow-constant, flashing lights. they faded into distance as if increasing altitude. initially thought it might be fighter jets practicing formations, but again, seemed like they were moving too slow to be a jet.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Needles
There were no other sightings in Needles on or around July 27th 2012
Summary: Many objects/lights hovering, to a semi-formation, some lights blinking
